name: Honk Hunt
description:
Honk Hunt is a Love Live! Sunshine!! fan game where you follow Chika and help her find clues during her search for Honoka, who has been spotted hanging around Tokyo at the same time Aqours will be in the city.

There are 3 endings and the game will take around 15-20 minutes, if you search everything in one route.

Have fun and enjoy!!
